: : SharpClaws : :

The rabid bot thinks of the previous events. They had failed and the cannon was gone. He hoped that it wasn't the only hope. He wished his friends to live on.

Despite the aid of StarStorm, SharpClaws spark terminates. His essence joins the matrix. He was gone.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Hydras/Perceptor/StarStorm:

StarSTorm helped Sharpclaws giving him first helps for a robot. 
Hydras looked around and growled "ALL THIS BATTLE WAS USELESS and WE 
HAVE AHEAVY DAMAGE!!!! IF THEY DECIDE ATTACK WE'RE LOST... 
PERCPETOR!!!! TAKE SOME PREDS WITH YA AND PICKED UP INJURED AND IN 
STASIS."



>  
> Both SharpClaws and Wolfenstein were blown from the site and were 
laying on the outskirts of the battlefield. They were heavily 
damaged. Wolf was still functioning but had fallen into stasis lock. 
SharpClaws would terminate soon.
> 
>
